Summary: huge triangle made up of lights
divs: Sighting Detailsi went out to my garden to light a smoke looked up as i do usually do at night.this huge triangle made up of other lights within the triangle went by at freightning speed. it was huge it must have passed right over dublin airport because im beside the airport it scared the c..p out of me. it was like the british red arrows doing a routine formation but it wasent it was made up of lights a triangle. not a sound did it make it glided across the sky. WOW. never seen anything like it.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Dublin
There were no other sightings in Dublin on or around October 28th 2013
